Body Labs (www.bodylabs.com) - NYC

Body Labs teaches computers how to understand human shape and pose. Using a 3D body scan or measurements as input, we create a body model that can be used across a wide variety of applications, including fashion, design, health, fitness, video games, animation, and more. Our mission is to provide the infrastructure that allows developers and companies to better bridge the gap between the human body and their products and applications.
